# TokenDrop.getDelegationOf() method

Get a specific address voting delegatee address

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDelegationOf(account: AddressOrEns): Promise<Address>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                  | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| account   | [AddressOrEns](./sdk.addressorens.md) |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Address](./sdk.address.md)&gt;

the address of your vote delegatee
